reviews.text:
1st time at this location and the service and views did not disappoint. Reservations highly recommended and they have happy hour till 6. Our waitress was nice to order multiple pitchers and put them in ice.
Drinks were good and food was delicious. wait staff was very knowledgeable and prompt.  View and the the walk up and down was the highlight.

Visited Singapore for the first time after 5 yrs with my hubby. View was great as well as  Food, and staffs are very kind, taking care of us nicely.  Elisa ( I hope I capture her name right) and other guy ( sorry I didn‚Äôt ask his name, with glasses) were so friendly and we had a great dinner there. Thanks for a great experience!

Brewerkz is one of the few restaurants that you can actually enjoy your delicious and warmly served food while enjoying the beautiful lighting show at the Singapore waterfront. I had the impossible burger with crispy with a touch of cucumber and cabbage  slices. I recommend this place.

Relatively pleasant microbrewery / restobar. Good choices on tap, decent grub as well. can't go wrong having casual drinks at any of their outlets, especially in a group. Locations down to your preference.
Popped up on a Thursday evening after a run. Service crew was very accommodating and warming when we arrived. Beers was of course awesome and the food arrived speedy and was delicious. Thumbs up üëç
